# Interface IntentNodeCreationConfig

Configuration for creating intent nodes

This interface was referenced by `InworldBasicConfigurationSchema`'s JSON-Schema via the `definition` "IntentNodeCreationConfig".

interface IntentNodeCreationConfig {  
embedder_component_id?: string;  
intents: [Intent](./graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Intent)[];  
llm_component_id?: string;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

## Properties

### `Optional`embedder_component_id

embedder_component_id?: string

ID of the embedder component to use

### intents

intents: [Intent](./graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Intent)[]

List of intents for the node

### `Optional`llm_component_id

llm_component_id?: string

ID of the LLM component to use
